meanings.sent1: The eohippuses roamed the ancient lands.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the fossils of eohippuses to learn about early horses.
meanings.sent3: The zoo had a special exhibit featuring animated eohippuses.
meanings.sent4: In her dream, the eohippuses galloped through fields of wildflowers.
meanings.sent5: Children were excited to see the skeletons of eohippuses at the museum.

meanings.definition: Eohippuses: belonging to or characteristic of eohippus
meanings.sent1: The researcher examined the eohippuses fossils carefully.
meanings.sent2: The eohippuses species had unique markings on their fur.
meanings.sent3: The eccentric artist painted a mural of rainbow-colored eohippuses.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the eohippuses' hooves.
meanings.sent5: The ancient cave drawings depicted mystical eohippuses running under the moonlight.
